channel.title: The Science Gab
channel.description: Recent content on The Science Gab

item.title: Hugo + React + Babel + GitHub Pages
item.description: This is a short tutorial on how to integrate React into a Hugo site hosted on GitHub Pages, to make interactive content such as explorabl.

item.title: A Simple Biological Circuit Simulator
item.description: Take me straight to the simulator! In a few months time, I’m very excited to be embarking on a PhD in Interdisciplinary Biosciences.

item.title: Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: I acknowledge the Traditional Custodians of the land on which I grew up and was educated, the Bunurong Boon Wurrung and Wurundjeri Woi Wurrung peoples of the Eastern Kulin Nation.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a physicist with a burgeoning interest in biosciences, particularly biophysics and computational biology with applications to solving the climate emergency.
